tag_list: partech-international, rock-in, aashish-puri, vc, ecommerce, fashion
overview:
Aashish Puri is the Founder and COO of leading fashion portal called Rock.in. Rock.in is a select store for men and women offering the best in apparel and accessories from International and Indian brands.

Aashish Puri was an Associate and later Principal at Partech International Partners. Passionate about technology, he actively focuses on the emerging trends in the Hi-tech sector.

He has previously worked at Sofinnova Partners and started his career as a Consultant at Computer Associates, working on international projects.

Ashish holds a double-masters with a MS in Engineering from Georgia Institute of Technology, USA and a Diplome deIngenieur from Ecole Superieure d’Electricite (SUPELEC), France. He also earned a Bachelor of Engineering with distinction in Telecommunications from Visvesvaraya Technological University, India.
